IncidentDef.label: Gopnik seeks company
IncidentDef.letterLabel: Gopnik in search of a squad
IncidentDef.letterText: "We raided a drug store, but they shot Dimon, and captured Andrey." - [PAWN_kind] says.\n\n [PAWN_pronoun] is looking for a new squad, perhaps they can join yours? Gopnikmay have beer on him as a welcoming gesture.
